name: LexisNexis Protégé™

commands.description: Request a legal document to draft
commands.title: Draft a document

commands.description: Get help and tips on using the product
commands.title: Help and prompt tips

longDescription:
**LexisNexis Protégé™ transforms the way you work to reach new levels of efficiency, productivity and value generation. Informed by your trusted data and authoritative LexisNexis content, Protégé™ streamlines your tasks, anticipates your intent, and delivers uniquely tailored work product to you, wherever you are. All with you in control, only in a private, secure setting.** 

 LexisNexis Protégé is a personalized AI-powered assistant that streamlines workflows and enhances productivity for legal and business professionals. It is uniquely tailored to each individual user and securely connected to the digital workflows they operate in - integrated into Microsoft 365 applications and LexisNexis solutions. 

 Protégé assists users with hundreds of tasks, transforming their work to reach new levels of efficiency, productivity and value generation. It empowers legal and business professionals in making informed decisions faster, generating outstanding work quality, and freeing up time to focus on efforts that drive economic value for their clients and organizations. 

 **Ask:** Collaborate with Protégé like a trusted colleague who intelligently and conversationally responds to requests and refines answers. 

 **Draft:** Go from blank page to arguments, contract clauses, and concise client communications, all grounded in authoritative content with remarkable speed, ease, and precision. 

 **Summarize:** Get accurate and complete summaries in seconds. 

 **Document Management System (DMS) Connectivity:** Combine authoritative LexisNexis content with trusted internal data (contracts, precedent briefs, and other relevant documents) to ensure Protégé responses are legally sound and align with firm-specific practices and knowledge. 

 **Get Started** 
 - LexisNexis Protégé in Microsoft 365 Copilot is available for preview in the US only. 
 - LexisNexis Protégé requires a subscription from LexisNexis®. Contact us for details. 
 For any additional questions, visit [Protégé](https://www.lexisnexis.com/en-us/products/protege.page), see the [Lexis+ AI™ FAQ](https://help.lexisnexis.com/Flare/lexisplusai/US/en_US/Content/HomeFAQ.htm), check out our [customer support information](https://supportcenter.lexisnexis.com/app/answers/answer_view/a_id/1089006), or [chat with a live representative](https://supportcenter.lexisnexis.com/app/chat/chat_launch/p/1763).
shortDescription: The personalized AI assistant for legal and business professionals.

examplePrompts.prompt: @LexisNexis Protégé™ Can you draft a document for a non-disclosure agreement between two companies?
examplePrompts.description: The user wants the bot to create a non-disclosure agreement document.

examplePrompts.prompt: @LexisNexis Protégé™ I need a summary of the latest case involving intellectual property rights.
examplePrompts.description: The user is asking the bot to summarize a recent case on intellectual property rights.

examplePrompts.prompt: @LexisNexis Protégé™ What are the key points from our firm's content about labor law updates?
examplePrompts.description: The user requests the bot to extract key points from their firm's content regarding updates in labor law.
